children.default: Idaho Wine Commission Seminar Featuring Joel Perez

children.name: richtext_content
children.label: Content
children.default: Watch a virtual round table discussion with Joel Perez hosted by the Idaho Wine Commission. Joel discuss three topics pertinent to Idaho growing regions - grape phylloxera identification and management, crown gall mitigation and soil pH management. To access all of the available seminars, complete the form below.
